mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, BOARD_NO, WRITER, NICK_NAME, CATEGORY, TITLE, CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, STATUS, BOARD_LEVEL, REF_NO FROM (SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.WRITER, M.NICK_NAME, B.CATEGORY, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.BOARD_DATE, B.STATUS, B.BOARD_LEVEL, B.REF_NO FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_LEVEL = 1 AND B.CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC

SELECT ROWNUM, BOARD_NO, WRITER, NICK_NAME, CATEGORY, TITLE, CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, STATUS, BOARD_LEVEL, REF_NO FROM (SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.WRITER, M.NICK_NAME, B.CATEGORY, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.BOARD_DATE, B.STATUS, B.BOARD_LEVEL, B.REF_NO FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_LEVEL = 1 AND B.CATEGORY = #{category} ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC) ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC

SELECT RO1, BOARD_NO, WRITER, NICK_NAME, CATEGORY, TITLE, CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, STATUS, BOARD_LEVEL, REF_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM "RO1", B.BOARD_NO, B.WRITER, M.NICK_NAME, B.CATEGORY, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.BOARD_DATE, B.STATUS, B.BOARD_LEVEL, B.REF_NO FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND CATEGORY = #{category} AND BOARD_LEVEL = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CATEGORY = #{category} AND BOARD_LEVEL = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES(SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, 1, NULL)
